applicant-information.form-instructions: (FR) Please provide your legal name (as indicated on your SIN card/letter). We will use the information you provided to verify your identity. Any information that does not match the information on your SIN appliation may cause delay in the processing of your application.

partner-information.provide-sin: (FR) Provide information on your current spouse or common-law partner as indicated on their SIN card/letter.
partner-information.required-information: (FR) This information is required to calculate the adjusted family net income. Please note that the spouse or common-law partner will need to submit their own application to the plan.
partner-information.confirm-checkbox: (FR) I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to the sharing of their personal information.

error-message.day: (FR) Day must be valid for the given month and year

personal-information.form-instructions: (FR) Adding a telephone number helps Service Canada reach you if there is an issue with your application and may help reduce delays in processing your application. Otherwise, we will contact you by mail using the mailing address you provide.

mailing-address.note: (FR) We may send you letters by mail related to your CDCP application.

home-address.use-mailing-address: (FR) My mailing address is the same as my home address

confirm.keep-copy: (FR) Keep a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: (FR) You will not be receiving a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application. You can use this button to print.
confirm.begin-process: (FR) We will begin processing your application immediately.
confirm.cdcp-checker: (FR) You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call 1-833-537-4342 to track the progress of your application.
confirm.use-code: (FR) You can use your application code to begin tracking the progress within 48 hours of applying.
confirm.register-msca-title: (FR) Register for a My Service Canada Account
confirm.register-msca-text: (FR) Once your application is processed, you will be able to sign into <mscaLink>My Service Canada Account(MSCA)</mscaLink> to view or update your personal information. You will also be able to view any letters sent to you from the Government of Canada regarding the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
confirm.msca-notify: (FR) You will be notified of your acceptance into the Canadian Dental Care Plan in MSCA.
confirm.how-insurance: (FR) How do I use my insurance?
confirm.eligible-text: (FR) If you are deemed eligible, Sun Life will send you a welcome package by mail. Your welcome package will include your member card and details about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, including your coverage start date. The Canadian Dental Care Plan will not reimburse you for dental services received before that date.
confirm.more-info-cdcp: (FR) For more information on what services and how much will be covered, visit <moreInfoLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan - What is covered</moreInfoLink>.
confirm.ineligible-text: (FR) If you are deemed ineligible and your circumstances change that may impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan, you can submit a new application.
confirm.more-info-service: (FR) For more information, please contact <dentalContactUsLink>Service Canada.</dentalContactUsLink>
confirm.consent: (FR) Consent: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.no-consent: (FR) Consent: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.
